Articles.Content: I think Im dumb but I cant get this to work... Can somebody tell me the exact location all the files go in?

Unzip it to the root KSP directory since that mod includes the complete directory structure.

In the zip file, it has \GameData\HrmHaystack\Plugins\<files>

In your directory, they should be in: {KSP}\GameData\HrmHaystack\Plugins\<files>

* Make sure you have the latest version (0.0.2.0): http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/haystack/

Hope that helps!
